## Logistic Sigmoid

$$\sigma(x)=\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}$$

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Lambda Function

$$\lambda(x)=\frac{1}{2x}\left\[\sigma(x)-\frac{1}{2}\right\]$$

------------------------------------------------------------------------
